kw.name: Open SuperSport Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to Appium server with capabilities

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

test.name: Verify member can remove wish list item from wish list page

kw.name: Launch SuperSport application, select language and log in
kw.doc: Launch application,select english language and log in

kw.name: Launch SuperSport Application
kw.doc: Launch application while Appium session running

kw.name: Launch Application
kw.doc: Launch application. Application can be launched while Appium session running. This keyword can be used to launch application during test case or between test cases.

kw.name: Select english language
kw.doc: Select english language at welcome page

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.doc: Input email to customer email input *Arguments:* - _*email*_ : Email of SuperSport user

kw.name: Verify Elements Are Visible
kw.doc: This keyword verify that page contains elements specified in arguments and verify each element is visible ['android=UiSelector().resourceIdMatches(".*id/item_name$")'] - Varargs of locators or elements

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Get Webelements
kw.doc: Returns list of [http://selenium-python.readthedocs.io/api.html#module-selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement|WebElement] objects matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Close SuperSport Application
kw.doc: Close current application while Appium session running

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
